RecvTrap function

function RecvTrap(Var Dest, Source, Enterprise, Community: string; Var Generic, Specific, Seconds: Integer; Const MIBName, MIBValue: TStringList): Integer;

Unit
SNMPTrap

Description
A very useful function and example of its use would be found in the TTrapSNMP object.

It receives a Trap and returns all the data that comes with it.
